ISSUE.TITLE: Permission modal broken in 1.0.0 b2777 RC1
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I installed the RC on an Ubuntu 14 using the bootstrap script and the updater afterwards. Everything went smoothly and redash works well. But I activated the "REDASH_FEATURE_SHOW_PERMISSIONS_CONTROL" feature and the modal opens but there are no users listed. Looking at the console I see a JS error which is not really pointing to me the problem (due to uglifying). How can I force webpack to not uglify and recreate the assets on live so I can create a better bug report? Nevertheless the JS error: `Error: [$injector:unpr] Unknown provider: eProvider <- e http://errors.angularjs.org/1.5.8/$injector/unpr?p0=eProvider%20%3C-%20e at http://redash.curated-shopping.io/vendor.665084fc1a2e4009e212.js:6:377 at http://redash.curated-shopping.io/vendor.665084fc1a2e4009e212.js:6:21267 at Object.i [as get] (http://redash.curated-shopping.io/vendor.665084fc1a2e4009e212.js:6:20223) at http://redash.curated-shopping.io/vendor.665084fc1a2e4009e212.js:6:21352 at i (http://redash.curated-shopping.io/vendor.665084fc1a2e4009e212.js:6:20223) at r (http://redash.curated-shopping.io/vendor.665084fc1a2e4009e212.js:6:20523) at Object.a [as invoke] (http://redash.curated-shopping.io/vendor.665084fc1a2e4009e212.js:6:20695) at u.instance (http://redash.curated-shopping.io/vendor.665084fc1a2e4009e212.js:7:14796) at f (http://redash.curated-shopping.io/vendor.665084fc1a2e4009e212.js:7:1725) at a (http://redash.curated-shopping.io/vendor.665084fc1a2e4009e212.js:6:30356) <div class="modal-content" uib-modal-transclude=""> (anonymous) @ vendor.665084fc1a2e4009e212.js:7`

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix: map visualization had severe performance issue. Close #1603.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix: pemrission dialog wasn't rendering. Closes #1633.
